name: sophisticatedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you have a good understanding of the way people behave, or a good knowledge of culture and fashion: sophisticatedly soulful late-night jazz She stepped into the high heels and draped the scarf sophisticatedly around her neck.
in a way that is intelligent, or that is made in a complicated way and therefore able to do complicated tasks: Perhaps it's time to think more sophisticatedly. It's very unusual to find devices so sophisticatedly put together.
More examplesFewer examplesThe romantic dining room is sophisticatedly decorated.He spun the stool around a few times and leaned on the counter sophisticatedly.
